title: The supply curve in long run

content.question: A market supply curve is more elastic in the long run than in the short run because

choices.label: the quantity demanded increases at a steady rate
there are no fixed inputs in the long run
of constant returns to scale in production
of diseconomies of scale in production

content.answer: there are no fixed inputs in the long run
